about:
Hey, I am the (in)famous ZHDeath. I used to be the number 1 player in terms of kills on the Overcast Network, but I quit due to the fact that a myriad of individuals despise me for virtually no reason over there. Perhaps I am a bit egotistic and prideful, but the amount of hate that I was getting over there was simply ridiculous, which was one of the reasons that I quit OCN entirely (I am never going back), and took a break from Minecraft for a while. I will not be playing as much on MC as I once was, but I am still "alive" and everything. I play Smite mostly now anyways; try it sometime... *Feel free to add me as a friend, but no targeting!*
